description: Corrected bass using the isolated track. I'm pretty confident that is much more accurate now, but I wasn't too sure about a few of the fills, particularly those in the "In time the hissing of her sanity..." riff.

description:
Made some improvements based off of the isolated tracks. I also rearranged the guitar tracks slightly, fixed grace notes to play Songsterr, added a twelve-string effect on the acoustic guitar and made chords easier to play by adding dead notes.

(Songsterr likes this file now)
title: Ghost Of Perdition
